name: A Game With Bomb And Rocket 💥
name_original: A Game With Bomb And Rocket 💥
description:
A Game With Bomb And Rocket is a game where you have to protect your garden from a giant bomb coming from space.

To defuse it you will have to shoot it with a rocket launcher until the bomb explodes...

I strongly recommend to do the tutorial first before starting a game.

SHORT VIDEO OF GAMEPLAY : 

The resources in this game were all made by me except for the following below:

- Royalty free music by Doctor_Dreamchip

https://www.patreon.com/doctordreamchip

- "Bug" effects by Jan Vorisek

https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/5728/bktglitch

Created with Game Maker Studio 2
